short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never feel anxious again when booking a hotel

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension removes all urgent, scarcity, limited availability messages when booking a hotel. 

Book your next holiday without feeling the pressure and making the wrong choices.
